kw.name: Create Session
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=develop, url=https://api-blacklist.qacoders.dev.br/api, headers={'accept': 'application/json', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.msg: POST Request : url=https://api-blacklist.qacoders.dev.br/api/login path_url=/api/login headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.3', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'accept': 'application/json', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Content-Length': '58'} body=b'{"mail": "sysadmin@qacoders.com", "password": "1234@Test"}'
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
